hero.title: About Noelza Service
hero.description: A company specialized in maritime solutions, offering ship agency and freight forward services with excellence since 2018.

history.title: Our History
history.paragraph1: Founded on February 14, 2018, Noelza Service was created to provide professional and efficient solutions for the Angolan maritime sector. Our journey has been marked by growth, reorganization, and market consolidation.
history.paragraph2: After a period of strategic reorganization, we resumed operations with a renewed structure and strong partnerships, establishing ourselves as a reference in ship agency and freight forward.

timeline.title: Reactivation
timeline.description: Resumption of activities with new structure

values.title: Excellence
values.description: Commitment to quality in all services provided

values.title: Reliability
values.description: Safe and efficient solutions for our clients

team.title: Multidisciplinary Team
team.description: Our team is composed of dedicated and efficient professionals with extensive experience in the maritime sector and committed to excellence in service.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Solve all legal procedures required among stakeholders, providing convenience and efficiency to clients.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Establish strong and persistent partnerships in the shipping sector, recognized for excellence and professionalism.
